languages.text: Мастерски изготовленный Адептус Механикус аугмент — локационная матрица. Ее сенсоры следят за окружающей средой и передают информацию в мозг владельца, улучшая его координацию и ощущение себя в пространстве.

traits.locale_text: Мастерски изготовленный Адептус Механикус аугмент — локационная матрица. Ее сенсоры следят за окружающей средой и передают информацию в мозг владельца, улучшая его координацию и ощущение себя в пространстве.

languages.text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.
languages.original_text: Мастерски изготовленный Адептус Механикус аугмент — локационная матрица. Ее сенсоры следят за окружающей средой и передают информацию в мозг владельца, улучшая его координацию и ощущение себя в пространстве.

traits.locale_text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

languages.text: このオーグメントは、帝国技術局が優れた技能で作成した探知マトリクスだ。オーグメントのセンサが周囲の状況を測定して持ち主の脳に情報を送り、座標と空間の認識能力を高める。
languages.original_text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

traits.locale_text: このオーグメントは、帝国技術局が優れた技能で作成した探知マトリクスだ。オーグメントのセンサが周囲の状況を測定して持ち主の脳に情報を送り、座標と空間の認識能力を高める。

languages.text: 这件由机械修会精心打造的植入物，实际上是个探测阵列。它可以通过传感器探测周边环境，并将相关信息输送到使用者的大脑，增强协调能力和空间感知能力。
languages.original_text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

traits.locale_text: 这件由机械修会精心打造的植入物，实际上是个探测阵列。它可以通过传感器探测周边环境，并将相关信息输送到使用者的大脑，增强协调能力和空间感知能力。

languages.text: Este aumento magistral, creado por el Adeptus Mechanicus, es una matriz localizadora. Sus sensores analizan el entorno y transmiten la información al cerebro de su propietario, aumentando su coordinación y su percepción espacial.
languages.original_text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

traits.locale_text: Este aumento magistral, creado por el Adeptus Mechanicus, es una matriz localizadora. Sus sensores analizan el entorno y transmiten la información al cerebro de su propietario, aumentando su coordinación y su percepción espacial.

languages.text: Cette augmentation, chef-d'œuvre de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, est une matrice de localisation. Ses capteurs détectent l'environnement proche et transmettent les informations au cerveau de son détenteur afin d'améliorer sa coordination et sa perception de l'espace.
languages.original_text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

traits.locale_text: Cette augmentation, chef-d'œuvre de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, est une matrice de localisation. Ses capteurs détectent l'environnement proche et transmettent les informations au cerveau de son détenteur afin d'améliorer sa coordination et sa perception de l'espace.

languages.text: Diese Augmentation, meisterhaft gefertigt vom Adeptus Mechanicus, ist eine Ortungsmatrix. Ihre Sensoren registrieren die Umgebung und senden die Informationen an das Gehirn des Trägers, wodurch dessen Koordination und Raumorientierung verbessert werden.
languages.original_text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

traits.locale_text: Diese Augmentation, meisterhaft gefertigt vom Adeptus Mechanicus, ist eine Ortungsmatrix. Ihre Sensoren registrieren die Umgebung und senden die Informationen an das Gehirn des Trägers, wodurch dessen Koordination und Raumorientierung verbessert werden.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus'un ustalıkla ürettiği bu ogment, bir konumlayıcı matrisidir. Sensörleri çevreyi izler ve sahibinin beynine bilgi ileterek koordinasyonu ile mekânsal farkındalığını artırır.
languages.original_text: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Mechanicus tarafından ustalıkla üretilen bu takviye, bir konumlayıcı matrisidir. Sensörleri çevreyi izler ve bilgileri sahibinin beynine ileterek koordinasyonunu ve mekânsal farkındalığını artırır.
